description.english: Meet Lynch for the first time.
Gamble by playing a game of "Verge".
Eat some delicious Street Ronin ramen noodles.
Complete "Working with Scraps" at least once. (Repeatable)
Fast travel by using the metro.
Successfully breach a system through hacking.
Pay a fixer to lower your heat.
Use a memory chip to save progress.
Travel between two districts (or subdistricts) on foot.
Have 3 or more weapon module augments installed at once.
Complete "Lend Me Your Ear" at least once. (Repeatable)
Complete "Tap Dancing". Doing so will unlock the contracts system.
Complete the Intro of the story.
Leave your apartment and begin your journey into Slade City.
